author: clement
msg: Adds a mechanism avoiding double injection of properties.

author: clement
msg: Updates the ANT task content to support the XML-Schema checking (some xerces packages were missing).

author: reinhard
msg: <action dev="reinhard" type="add" issue="COCOON3-2" due-to="Simone Tripodi">[cocoon-pipeline] Add a SchemaProcessorTransformer that validates the SAX event stream against an XML schema.</action>
